reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review: Hmmm..... sincerely I really do love it...like you added some new things which made it more better than the ones I've used. I love how it feels on my skin, the scent...and then it doesn't change the color of my nails, rather it makes them shine better

reviews.title: Would Buy Again
reviews.review: Without filter am in love with my skin, Thank you

reviews.title: Good but expensive
reviews.review: The hydrating facial wash and toner are really nice. Yesterday, my customer complimented me, saying 'Baby girl, your face is glowing too much! Don't come and blind me one day! Your products are great for my skin

reviews.title: Fantastic Value!
reviews.review: You did your thing I can't believe my skin can look this good x

reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
reviews.review: I don't usually step out of my house. I hardly go out. Yesterday I stepped out and my skin was fine, l can't even lie. I walked with pride.

reviews.title: A must-have!
reviews.review: Your products are really, really nice, and they're so gentle on the skin. Even the Pure Radiance Body Soap I bought is working so well for me! The stretch marks on my thighs and butt are already fading, and I'm so happy. I absolutely love your products
